title: Simulated and measured piezoelectric energy harvesting of dynamic load in tires
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Henrik Staaf, Simon Matsson, Sobhan Sepheri, Elof Köhler, Kaies Daoud, Fredrik Ahrentorp, Christian Jonasson, Peter Folkow, Leena Ryynänen, Mika Penttila, Cristina Rusu
